name: com.xcodebuildmcp/XcodeBuildMCP
description: XcodeBuildMCP provides tools for Xcode project management, simulator management, and app utilities.

environmentVariables.description: Enable experimental xcodemake incremental builds (true/false or 1/0).
environmentVariables.name: INCREMENTAL_BUILDS_ENABLED

environmentVariables.description: Enable AI-powered dynamic tool discovery to load only relevant workflows.
environmentVariables.name: XCODEBUILDMCP_DYNAMIC_TOOLS

environmentVariables.description: Comma-separated list of workflows to load in Static Mode (e.g., 'simulator,device,project-discovery').
environmentVariables.name: XCODEBUILDMCP_ENABLED_WORKFLOWS

environmentVariables.description: Enable verbose debug logging from the server.
environmentVariables.name: XCODEBUILDMCP_DEBUG
